alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Escambia; Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 11:26PM CDT until March 30 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MOBILE...CENTRAL BALDWIN...SOUTHWESTERN ESCAMBIA AND NORTHWESTERN ESCAMBIA COUNTIES... At 1126 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles east of Mount Vernon to Stapleton to Fairhope, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Daphne, Fairhope, Bay Minette, Atmore, Spanish Fort, Robertsdale, Loxley, Stockton, Stapleton, Mount Vernon, Silverhill, Bratt, I65 And CR 1, I65 And AL 21, I65 And AL 225 and Poarch Creek Reservation. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for south central and southwestern Alabama...and northwestern Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
